description: Complete Gametest Workflow Suite - Execute all 6 BMAD gametest workflows to create comprehensive test coverage for Vimana

userStories.title: Game Test Framework Setup
userStories.description: Initialize/verify the test framework for Vimana. Create documentation explaining the testing infrastructure (Vitest + Playwright).
userStories.notes: Framework already exists, focus on documentation and verification

userStories.title: Game Test Design
userStories.description: Create comprehensive test scenarios covering all 9 Music Room Epic stories, core gameplay, audio, physics, video, and UI systems.
acceptanceCriteria: Identify critical systems (harp, audio, physics, video, UI)
Create test scenarios using GIVEN/WHEN/THEN format
All 9 stories covered in test design
userStories.notes: Focus on Music Room Epic stories, use GIVEN/WHEN/THEN format

userStories.title: Automated Test Generation
userStories.description: Generate automated tests (unit + E2E) based on TEST-DESIGN.md. Create test files for managers, entities, and critical user flows.
acceptanceCriteria: Analyze src/ directory for testable systems
Generate E2E tests (Playwright) for harp interaction
Generate E2E tests for jelly creatures
Generate E2E tests for vortex activation
Generate smoke tests (game launch, intro video, music room load)
E2E tests run successfully (npm run test:e2e)
userStories.notes: Use Vitest for unit tests, Playwright for E2E, follow existing patterns

userStories.title: Playtest Planning
userStories.description: Create structured playtesting sessions to validate gameplay, gather user feedback, and identify issues that automated testing cannot catch.
acceptanceCriteria: Define playtest objectives (harp interaction, teaching mechanic)
Define metrics to collect (success rate, time to harmony, frustration points)
Create observation guide (what to watch for)
userStories.notes: Internal playtest focus, 30-minute sessions, harp duet mechanic

userStories.title: Performance Testing Strategy
userStories.description: Design comprehensive performance testing covering frame rate, memory usage, loading times, and platform-specific requirements.
acceptanceCriteria: Define performance targets (60 FPS desktop, 30 FPS mobile)
Identify test scenarios (max particles, stress tests)
Create benchmark scenarios (max jellies, full scene)
Generate performance tests (particle stress, memory leaks)
FPS targets defined for all platforms
userStories.notes: Focus on particles (jellies, vortex), draw calls, memory, loading

userStories.title: Test Suite Review
userStories.description: Review existing test suite quality, identify coverage gaps, and recommend improvements. Validate all tests created in previous workflows.
acceptanceCriteria: Gather test suite metrics (count by type, pass rate)
Assess test quality (deterministic, isolated, fast, readable)
userStories.notes: Final workflow, validate all previous workflows, ensure comprehensive coverage
